name: Defend the manager
description:
a game where you need to defend your managers from angry customers.

GAMEPLAY

swipe left to right to prevent the customers from coming to your manager.               just......don't let them get too far ;).

DIFFICULTY

there are 3 difficulty settings: Easy, Normal, and Hard. there is also a mode where you can give the customers some abilities to add some extra difficulty.

TUTORIAL

this game also has a tutorial where you can learn everything you need to know before starting the game.
